short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed up your Sainsbury's shop. Record your favourite recipes and add them to your basket in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Snapshot your whole Sainsbury's basket to store a new list
- Start recording and capture just the items you want to be saved in your list
- Add an entire list or individual items to your basket
- Sync your lists to your other desktop devices

Great for saving recipes, or items that you frequently order together.
